message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it holds significant value for you, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with it. To kick things off, I'd like to propose a starting price of $1,000,000. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $600,000 is significantly below its true value and what I'm willing to accept.  To move this forward, I can come down to $900,000. This is my best offer and reflects the value this product will bring to your business.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $900,000 is still out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $700,000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
